summary: Implements admin‑side utilities for accessing and managing the in‑memory data store of Open Library. It defines a lightweight entity wrapper exposing identifiers, type and relationships, and helper classes that perform HTTP GET/POST operations to read or modify memory resources. A small rendering helper is also provided for generating admin views.
business_intent: Allow administrators to inspect, query, and edit memory‑based objects via the web interface, facilitating debugging and maintenance of the system's internal data.
